title: The Best Golf Fans in the U.S.
headline: The Best Golf Fans in the U.S.
description: Big cheers. Massive galleries. Unbridled fanaticism. These cities, like Scottsdale, Ariz., love their golf, and they give the sport a special welcome whenever it comes to town.
